contents.tooltip: +1 bonus die on all tests with this weapon
contents.label: Smart [Yes]

contents.tooltip: Single Shot. Characters can fire one bullet as a simple action. The player totals their Firearms skill plus accuracy and can use that many dice from their Finesse pool to fire the weapon.
contents.label: SS

contents.tooltip: Double Tap. Characters can fire two bullets at the same target as a simple action, adding one bonus die to the test.
contents.label: DT

contents.tooltip: Burst Fire. Characters can fire three bullets at a target per simple action, adding 3 bonus dice to the test.
contents.label: B

contents.tooltip: Full Auto. In this gun mode, a character fires 20 bullets (assuming the gun has the ammunition to fire). It adds 20 bonus dice (one per bullet). The character may fire at multiple targets, split- ting the dice between targets. Each sequen- tial target adds a penalty die.
contents.label: FA
